messages.message: Invalid VkFormat. VkFormat must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED for BASIS_LZ supercompression.
messages.details: VkFormat is VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM but for supercompressionScheme BASIS_LZ it must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED.

messages.message: Invalid colorModel for basic DFD. If vkFormat is not VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED colorModel must be either KHR_DF_MODEL_RGBSDA or KHR_DF_MODEL_YUVSDA.
messages.details: Basic DFD #1 colorModel is KHR_DF_MODEL_ETC1S but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM it must be must be either KHR_DF_MODEL_RGBSDA or KHR_DF_MODEL_YUVSDA.
